message.content:
The task is to identify and extract the line item and value representing the addition in the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit during the period. In a cash flow statement, this corresponds to "Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable."

From the given data:

| Account                             | Amount      | Date      |
|-----------------------------------|-------------|-----------|
| Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable  | 2100000.00 | 2024-01-30 |

This line shows a positive change of 2,100,000.00, indicating an increase in the amount owed on credit during the period.

Hence, the solution value is "2100000.00".

```json
{"solution": {"value": "2100000.00"}}
```
